    • Method Detail

      • isKeyExist

        boolean isKeyExist(int keyId,
                   int keyType,
                   android.os.Bundle bundle)
            throws android.os.RemoteException
        Check if Key is exists
        Parameters:
        keyType -
        • 0x01 (3DES)dukpt key
        • 0x02 (AES)dukpt key
        keyId - the id (index 0~254) of the key
        extend - - extend param for the future
        Returns:
        true for exist, false for not exists
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • clearKey

        boolean clearKey(int keyId,
                 int keyType,
                 android.os.Bundle bundle)
          throws android.os.RemoteException
        clear Dukpt key
        Parameters:
        keyId - clear key id
        keyType -
        • 0x01-DES DUKPT
        • 0x02-AES DUKPT
        Returns:
        true for exist, false for not exists
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • loadDukptKey

        boolean loadDukptKey(int keyId,
                     byte[] ksn,
                     byte[] key,
                     byte[] checkValue,
                     android.os.Bundle extend)
              throws android.os.RemoteException
        load the DUKPT key
        Parameters:
        keyId - the id (index 0~254)
        ksn - the key serial number
        key - the key
        checkValue - the check value (default NULL)
        extend - - extend param
        • isPlainKey(boolean) default value is true(key is plain key), value is false means the key is a encrypt key that encrypt by TEK
        • TEKIndex(int) index of TEK,if isPlainKey is false, need to set this paramater
        • KSNAutoIncrease(boolean) default value is true, if value is false, application use increaseKSN() to increase KSN manually
        • keyType(int), 0-3DES(default if not set), 1-AES
        • AESinitialKeyType(byte), just for AES calculate
          |---2-AES128(default)
          |---3-AES192
          |---4-AES256
        Returns:
        true on success, false on failure
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • calculateMAC

        android.os.Bundle calculateMAC(int keyId,
                               int type,
                               byte[] CBCInitVec,
                               byte[] data,
                               int desType,
                               android.os.Bundle extend)
                        throws android.os.RemoteException
        calcute the MAC with given type
        Parameters:
        index - keyID(0~254)
        type - Calculation mode
        |---0x00-MAC X99;
        |---0x01-MAC X919;
        |---0x02-ECB (CUP standard ECB algorithm);
        |---0x03-MAC 9606;
        |---0x04-CBC MAC calculation;
        |---0x05-MAC_ISO9797; @Deprecated
        |---0x06-MAC_CMAC; CMAC algorithm (Use AES)
        CBCInitVec - - CBC initial vector. fixed length 8, can be null, default 8 bytes 0x00
        data - the source date
        desType - encrypt type
        |--0x00-des
        |--0x01-3des
        |--0x02-sm4
        |--0x03-aes
        extend - - extend param
        • variantRequestKey(boolean) for des/3des desType, true-Message Authentication, request or both ways; false-Message Authentication, response(default)
        • AESKeyUsageIndicator(byte), just for AES calculate
          |---0-AES Data Encryption, use Msg. Auth. Gen. Key(default)
          |---1-AES Data Encryption, use Msg. Auth. Ver. Key
          |---2-AES Data Encryption, use M. Auth. Both Ways Key
        • AESDispersionType(byte), just for AES calculate
          |---0-DES112
          |---1-DES168
          |---2-AES128(default)
          |---3-AES192
          |---4-AES256
        Returns:
        Bundle include encrypted data and KSN involved in the calculation, null means failure
        • encryptedData(byte[]) encrypted data block
        • ksn(byte[])
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • calculateData

        android.os.Bundle calculateData(int keyId,
                                int encryptType,
                                int algorithmModel,
                                byte[] data,
                                byte[] initVec,
                                android.os.Bundle extend)
                         throws android.os.RemoteException
        Parameters:
        index - keyID(0~254)
        encryptType
         - |---TYPE_DES - 0x00 DES Type
        |---TYPE_3DES - 0x01 3DES Type
        |---TYPE_SM4 - 0x02 SM4 Type
        |---TYPE_AES - 0x03 AES Type
        algorithmModel
         - |--0x01 CBC encrypt
        |--0x02 ECB encrypt
        |--0x03 CBC decrypt
        |--0x04 ECB decrypt
        data - the source date
        initVec - cbc init vector
        extend - - extend param
        • dukptDispersionType(byte) for des/3des encryptType
          |---0x00 Data Encryption request or both ways
          |---0x01 Data Encryption response (default)
          |---0x02 Customize, use Pin Variant constant
        • AESKeyUsageIndicator(byte), just for AES calculate
          |---0-AES Data Encryption, encryption(default)
          |---1-AES Data Encryption, decryption
          |---2-AES Data Encryption, both encryption and decryption
        • AESDispersionType(byte), just for AES calculate
          |---0-DES112
          |---1-DES168
          |---2-AES128(default)
          |---3-AES192
          |---4-AES256
        Returns:
        Bundle include encrypted data and KSN involved in the calculation, null means failure
        • encryptedData(byte[]) encrypted data block
        • ksn(byte[])
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

        java.lang.String getLastError()
                       throws android.os.RemoteException
        get the last error
        Returns:
        the description of the last error
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

        byte[] increaseKSN(int index,
                   int keyType,
                   android.os.Bundle extend)
            throws android.os.RemoteException
        increase ksn(just for DEX dukpt)
        Parameters:
        index - keyID(0~254)
        keyType - 0-3DES(default if not set), 1-AES
        extend - extend other features for the future
        Returns:
        current ksn
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException
